ModMetaData.name: DE Surgeries
ModMetaData.author: DarknessEyes
ModMetaData.description: New surgeries: * Repair ear damage. * Repair nose damage. * Repair finger and toes. * Remove gut worms and muscle parasite. * Use glitterworld medicine to cure chronic diseases. * Inject medicine to put patient into sleep and increase healing speed. * Added Pelvis reconstruction /n/ Shamelessly updated through A14 to A17 without permission by KapTaiN_KaVerN
